meta.title: Auxite | The Digital Form of Tradition
meta.description: Buy, sell, and stake physically allocated gold, silver, platinum, and palladium — fully on-chain with real-time proof of reserves.
meta.keywords: tokenized gold, tokenized silver, precious metals, blockchain, DeFi, crypto, LBMA, physical backing, staking

home.title: Own Real
home.subtitle: Buy, sell, and stake physically allocated gold, silver, platinum, and palladium — fully on-chain.
home.whySubtitle: The most transparent way to own precious metals.

features.onChainDesc: Every transaction recorded on blockchain. No hidden ledgers.
features.physicalDesc: Each token = 1 gram real metal in LBMA-approved vaults.
features.stakeDesc: Lock metals for protocol-based incentives. No counterparty risk.
features.transparentDesc: Real-time proof of reserves. Verify anytime.

steps.buyDesc: Purchase tokenized metals using crypto. 1 token = 1 gram.
steps.verifyDesc: Check real-time proof of reserves in Trust Center.
steps.stakeDesc: Lock tokens to earn protocol rewards. No lending.

home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who trust Auxite for transparent precious metal ownership.

metals.title: Tokenized
metals.subtitle: Each token represents exactly 1 gram of physically allocated metal, stored in LBMA-approved vaults worldwide.
metals.goldDesc: Humanity's most trusted store of value for over 5,000 years. Each token = 1 gram of real gold in LBMA-approved vaults.
metals.silverDesc: Unique combination of monetary value and industrial demand. Each token = 1 gram of silver in secure vaults.
metals.platinumDesc: 30x rarer than gold, prized for industrial applications. Each token = 1 gram of platinum.
metals.palladiumDesc: Critical role in catalytic converters drives demand. Each token = 1 gram of palladium.
metals.infoDesc: Every token is backed 1:1 by physical metal stored in LBMA-accredited vaults. Verify anytime on-chain.
metals.softLaunchDesc: During soft launch, buy/sell limits are temporarily applied. Staking is limited to 91-day terms.

metalDetail.aboutContent: {symbol} represents tokenized {metal} on the blockchain. Each token is backed 1:1 by physical {metal} stored in LBMA-accredited vaults. You can buy, sell, stake, and verify your holdings anytime.
metalDetail.feature1Desc: Every token backed by real metal in secure vaults
metalDetail.feature2Desc: Verify reserves anytime via smart contracts
metalDetail.feature4Desc: Buy, sell, or transfer 24/7 on Polygon

buySell.title: Buy & Sell
buySell.subtitle: Trade tokenized precious metals directly from your wallet.
buySell.walletDesc: Access full trading features including buy, sell, stake, and verify your holdings in our secure wallet application.

steps.connectDesc: Link your Web3 wallet to the platform.
steps.receiveDesc: Tokens arrive in your wallet instantly.

buySell.limitsDesc: During soft launch, temporary buy and sell limits are enforced for all metal tokens.

staking.title: Stake Your
staking.subtitle: Lock your metal tokens on-chain for fixed durations and earn protocol-based rewards. No lending, no counterparty risk.
staking.benefit1Desc: Earn protocol rewards on your holdings
staking.benefit3Desc: Unlock exclusive features as you stake more
staking.infoDesc: When you stake, your tokens are locked in a smart contract. You continue to own the underlying metal while earning rewards. Unstake anytime after the lock period.

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: From purchase to verification — transparent tokenized metal ownership.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up and complete verification to start trading.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Add funds via crypto or fiat to start purchasing.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Purchase tokenized gold, silver, platinum, or palladium.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Verify your holdings on-chain and earn rewards by staking.
howItWorks.ctaDesc: Join thousands of users who trust Auxite for tokenized precious metals.

steps.connectDesc: Connect any Web3 wallet or create one through the app.
steps.chooseDesc: Select Gold, Silver, Platinum, or Palladium tokens.
steps.buyDesc: Purchase using supported crypto. Instant delivery.
steps.allocateDesc: Physical metal allocated in LBMA vault, recorded on-chain.
steps.holdDesc: Store value, stake for rewards, or sell anytime.
steps.verifyDesc: Check Trust Center for proof of reserves.

vaults.title: Global
vaults.subtitle: Your metals are stored in LBMA-accredited vaults across strategic global locations.
vaults.security2Desc: Complete coverage against theft and damage

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Auxite.
faq.a1: Auxite is a platform for buying, selling, and staking tokenized precious metals. Each token represents 1 gram of physical metal stored in LBMA-accredited vaults.
faq.a2: When you purchase tokens, an equivalent amount of physical metal is allocated in our vault network. The token represents your ownership of that metal.
faq.a3: Yes. All metals are stored in LBMA-accredited vaults with full insurance. You can verify reserves on-chain anytime.
faq.a4: Create an account, complete verification, fund your wallet, and purchase tokens directly on our platform.
faq.a5: We charge a small spread on trades. There are no hidden fees. Staking and verification are free.
faq.a6: Yes, you can request physical redemption for larger holdings. Contact support for details.
faq.a7: Our vaults are LBMA-accredited with 24/7 surveillance, armed security, and full insurance coverage.
faq.q8: How can I verify my holdings?
faq.a8: All reserves are verifiable on-chain. Visit our Trust Center to see real-time proof of reserves.
faq.q9: What happens if Auxite shuts down?
faq.a9: Your metals are held in segregated custody. You would be able to claim your physical metal directly from the vault.
faq.contactDesc: Our support team is here to help.

questions.whatAnswer: Platform for tokenized precious metals. 1 token = 1 gram physical metal in LBMA vaults. Fully on-chain.
questions.backedAnswer: Yes, 100%. Every token backed by allocated metal in LBMA-approved vaults. Real metal, not paper.
questions.rewardsAnswer: No. Protocol-based incentives, NOT guaranteed. Auxite does not lend.
questions.withdrawAnswer: No. Staked tokens locked for full duration.
questions.verifyAnswer: Trust Center shows proof of reserves and on-chain supply data.

team.subtitle: Experienced professionals building the future of tokenized assets.

legal.title: Legal Documents
legal.subtitle: Important legal information about using Auxite.
legal.termsDesc: Terms and conditions for using our platform.
legal.privacyDesc: How we collect, use, and protect your data.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing or using Auxite, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use our services.
terms.section2Content: You must be at least 18 years old and legally permitted to use our services in your jurisdiction.
terms.section3Content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and all activities under your account.
terms.section4Content: You may not use our services for illegal activities, market manipulation, or any activity that violates applicable laws.
terms.section5Content: Auxite is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

sections.acceptanceDesc: By using Auxite, you agree to these Terms of Service.
sections.eligibilityDesc: You must be 18+ and legally able to enter contracts.
sections.servicesDesc: Buy, sell, and stake tokenized precious metals. 1 token = 1 gram.
sections.stakingDesc: Rewards are protocol-based, NOT guaranteed. Tokens locked for full duration.
sections.risksDesc: Market volatility, smart contract, regulatory, and custody risks apply.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly, such as account details, and information automatically collected through your use of our services.
privacy.section2Content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, comply with legal requirements, and communicate with you.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with service providers and as required by law.
privacy.section4Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

sections.collectionDesc: We collect information you provide when creating an account or contacting support.
sections.usageDesc: Used to provide services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
sections.sharingDesc: We don't sell your data. Only shared with service providers as needed.
sections.securityDesc: We implement appropriate measures to protect against unauthorized access.
sections.rightsDesc: Request access, correction, or deletion of your data by contacting us.

risk.title: Risk Disclosure
risk.warningContent: Trading tokenized precious metals involves significant risks. You may lose some or all of your investment. Only invest what you can afford to lose.
risk.warningDesc: Investing involves significant risks. Only invest what you can afford to lose.
risk.section1Content: Precious metal prices fluctuate based on market conditions. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
risk.section2Content: Blockchain technology and smart contracts may have vulnerabilities. We implement security measures but cannot guarantee against all risks.
risk.section3Content: Regulations around digital assets are evolving. Changes in laws may affect your ability to use our services.
risk.section4Content: While we use LBMA-accredited vaults with insurance, custody of physical assets carries inherent risks.

sections.marketDesc: Precious metal prices can be highly volatile.
sections.contractDesc: Contracts are audited but inherent risks exist.
sections.stakingDesc: Rewards not guaranteed. No early withdrawal.

trustCenter.title: Trust
trustCenter.subtitle: Full transparency — real on-chain data only.

statements.2: All tokens backed by physical metals.

trustCenter.realDataDesc: Auxite never publishes simulated metrics. All data shown is real on-chain information.

footer.description: On-chain tokenized precious metals. Buy, sell, stake, and verify physically allocated gold, silver, platinum, and palladium.
footer.backed: All tokens are backed by physically allocated metals.

onChainSupply.title: On-Chain
onChainSupply.subtitle: Real-time verification of token supply against physically allocated metals in LBMA-accredited vaults.
onChainSupply.messageInitializing: Real on-chain data will appear as activity occurs.
onChainSupply.messageFullyBacked: All tokens are fully backed by physical metals.
onChainSupply.messageSettlementPending: Minor variance due to settlement timing. Resolves within 24h.
onChainSupply.messageCoverageAlert: Coverage below threshold. Emergency controls may be activated.
onChainSupply.howVerificationWorksDesc: Token supply is read directly from smart contracts on Polygon. Allocated metals are verified through vault custody reports from LBMA-accredited facilities in Zurich, Singapore, London, and Dubai.
